The purpose study assess short term ( 6 month follow-up - Phase 1 ) long term period ( 24 month follow-up - Phase 2 ) , incidence pre-specified clinical arrhythmic event patient low ejection fraction ( EF ) hospitalize acute cardiac decompensation . A previously implant Reveal® XT device use collect heart rhythm information .
